articles.title: Cruise passenger was served 33 drinks before deadly encounter with crew, suit says
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> Michael Virgil, 35, became agitated on a Royal Caribbean ship and was restrained by at least five crew members, including some who stood on his back, before he died, the medical examiner said.
